mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Rosecrans, William Starke to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rosecrans, William Starke
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Nov 30 1861. By Telegraph from Camp Gauley Mt 30 1861. Maj Darr has gone to Camp Chase & will order Miles Jacoby sent to Wheeling WS Rosecrans Brig Genl Comdg 15Hm70paid
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Rosecrans, William Starke
Camp Gauley
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
